about_the_game:
Cook big burgers!

Push giant pieces of food into the correct order requested by customers. Rank up and upgrade your work station along the way to become a master chef!

Interact with the people in town!

Decide whether or not to interact with the unfolding story set inside the town. Completing quests or simply talking with strangers may prove to be beneficial.

Survive and participate in combat!

Load up with tools and a weapon by supporting one of the local shops. Defend against what lurks in the darkness and stay rich in health to uncover hidden secrets.

Explore fun pastimes!

Catch fish and cook it by the furnace or maybe pass time playing video games at the arcade! And if the outside sounds like more fun, then enjoy competing in sports and racing events. Don't forget to test your luck at the casino!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3-3220 CPU
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-8250U CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Big Burger Store is a 2D top down cooking game where you push around giant food items and serve burger orders to customers. Explore the busy world outside of work and participate in activities such as going fishing, fighting monsters, gambling, and so much more!
